<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="lg48502_exhibit_23.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_lg48502_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 23.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="lg48502_consent_of_independent__lg402322"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_lg48502_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>We
consent to the incorporation by reference in the following Registration Statements: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(1)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Registration
Statement (Form&nbsp;S-3 No.&nbsp;333-111895),
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(2)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Registration
Statement (Form&nbsp;S-8 No.&nbsp;333-135079) pertaining to the 2006 Non-Employee Directors' Stock Grant and Stock Option Plan,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(3)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Registration
Statement (Form&nbsp;S-8 No.&nbsp;333-129349) pertaining to the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Plan,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(4)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Registration
Statement (Form&nbsp;S-8 No.&nbsp;333-121552) pertaining to the 2004 Equity Incentive Plan,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(5)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Registration
Statement (Form&nbsp;S-8 No.&nbsp;333-81274) pertaining to the 2002 Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(6)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Registration
Statement (Form&nbsp;S-8 No.&nbsp;333-10069) pertaining to the 1996 Equity Incentive Plan and the 1996 Non-Employee Directors'
Stock Option Plan; </FONT></DD></DL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>of
our reports dated March&nbsp;27, 2008, with respect to the consolidated financial statements and schedule of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. and the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting
of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. included in this annual report (Form&nbsp;10-K) for the year ended February&nbsp;2, 2008. </FONT></P>

<TYPE>EX-23.2

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 23.2
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#08ZAF48501_9">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="li48502_exhibit_23.2"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_li48502_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 23.2    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
Board of Directors<BR>
Guess?,&nbsp;Inc.: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>We
consent to the incorporation by reference in the registration statements (No.&nbsp;333-135079, 333-10069, 333-129349, 333-121552 and
333-81274) on Form&nbsp;S-8 and registration statement (No.&nbsp;333-111895) on Form&nbsp;S-3, of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries of our
report dated May&nbsp;25, 2007, with respect to the consolidated balance sheet of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries as of February&nbsp;3, 2007, and the related consolidated statements of
income, stockholders' equity and comprehensive income, and cash flows for the one-month period ended February&nbsp;3, 2007, and the related financial statement schedule; and our report
dated February&nbsp;28, 2007, with respect to the consolidated statements of income, stockholders' equity and comprehensive income, and cash flows of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries for each of
the years in the two-year period ended December&nbsp;31, 2006, and the related financial statement schedule, which reports appear in the February&nbsp;2, 2008 annual report on
Form&nbsp;10-K of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Our
reports refer to the adoption of FASB Interpretation No.&nbsp;48, "Accounting for Uncertainty in Income Taxes," on January&nbsp;1, 2007, Statement of Financial Accounting Standards
No.&nbsp;123(R), "Share-Based Payment," on January&nbsp;1, 2006 and Statement of Financial Accounting Standards No.&nbsp;158, "Employers' Accounting for Defined Benefit Pension and Other
Postretirement Plans," as of December&nbsp;31, 2006. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/
KPMG&nbsp;LLP </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Los
Angeles, California<BR>
March&nbsp;27, 2008 </FONT></P>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>10
<FILENAME>a2183334zex-31_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 31.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#08ZAF48501_10">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="lk48502_exhibit_31.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_lk48502_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;31.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Paul Marciano, certify that: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc.;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of
operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant's other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
for the registrant and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating
to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance
regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>c)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and
procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>d)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Disclosed
in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>
</DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant's other certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the
audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent function):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the
registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
</UL>
<BR>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="46%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Date: April&nbsp;1, 2008</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>By:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="46%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2>PAUL MARCIANO</FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><HR NOSHADE><FONT SIZE=2> Paul Marciano<BR></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Chief Executive Officer and<BR>
Vice Chairman of the Board</I></FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->

Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))

<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed

<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance
regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;

the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and

<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>

registrant's other certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the
audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent function):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the
registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>

Dennis R. Secor, certify that: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc.;

on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of

<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant's other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
for the registrant and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating

such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance

significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the
registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
</UL>
<BR>

information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company. </FONT></DD></DL>
